meanings.definition: Remove from a list or directory.
meanings.sent1: The librarian delisted the outdated books from the catalog.
meanings.sent2: The teacher delisted the absent students from the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent3: The chef delisted the unpopular dish from the menu.
meanings.sent4: The gardener delisted the dying plants from the garden bed.
meanings.sent5: The manager delisted the old products from the inventory.

meanings.definition: No longer listed on a stock exchange.
meanings.sent1: The company was delisted from the stock exchange due to financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: Investors were surprised when the delisted stock suddenly gained value.
meanings.sent3: The delisted company found success in niche markets.
meanings.sent4: The delisted stock became a symbol of resilience in the market.
meanings.sent5: The delisted status of the company made it a cautionary tale for others.
